intro: I'm a self-taught front-end developer based in Kyiv, Ukraine. I can develop responsive websites from scratch and raise them into modern user-friendly web experiences.

Transforming my creativity and knowledge into a websites has been my passion for over a year. I have been helping various clients to establish their presence online. I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.
fun_facts: I like winter more than summer
I often bike with my friends
I was in Egypt, Poland and Turkey
My favorite movie is The Green Mile
I like winter more than summer
